key_risks: Supply chain disruptions impacting product availability and revenue growth
Economic sensitivity due to fluctuations in IT spending
Intense competitive pressures in the technology reseller market
Regulatory risks in heavily regulated sectors like government and healthcare
controversies: Underperformance of CDW's stock, declining 21% over three months and 17% year-to-date as of October 2023
Investigation by law firms (e.g., Schall Law Firm, Portnoy Law) for potential claims on behalf of investors
environmental_issues: Investment in sustainability initiatives, including carbon neutrality goals, with uncertain financial impact
governance_issues: Ongoing legal investigations raising concerns about governance and transparency

sources.title: CDW Stock-Ticker Mixup Briefly Erases $22 Billion in Value (1)
sources.snippet: A flurry of trades more than five hours before the US stock market opened in New York on Thursday seemingly wiped out more than $22 billion in value for an information technology company in another case of mistaken identity..
